column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=The other day I decided to take my bike out on the local scenic bike trail .
#id=2
#text=A few miles into my ride , I was trying to dodge a runner that was n't paying attention and I ended up running over a piece of debris in the trail .
#id=3
#text=I started noticing that it was getting harder to pedal my bike , so I stopped to evaluate the situation .
#id=4
#text=Once I looked at the tire , I realized it was flat and that I needed to repair it .
#id=5
#text=Thankfully , I kept tire repair supplies in my bag for situations just like this !
#id=6
#text=I placed a temporary patch on the tire and used my portable pump to inflate it again .
#id=7
#text=I set off to ride again , and the same thing happened .
#id=8
#text=I had to temporarily repair the tire three more times just to make it back to my car .
#id=9
#text=Once I made it home , I removed the tire and placed a new one on .
#text=That 's how I repaired my flat bicycle tire .
